content: this is a really nice and easy pattern so you can make your own reusable christmas cracker hats i knitted some reusable christmas crackers so it seemed the natural choice to make some hats to go inside them too this pattern is worked in knit garter stitch throughout you will also need to know how to increase and decrease your stitches by either making a stitch m1 or casting off in order to create the points of the crown as this is worked length ways you can keep knitting until it is the right length to fit around your head i found that 5 points of the crown was just right for my head
